scripts.push-to-s3: aws s3 sync --profile TMG_michael --acl private build/ s3://mundo-group-lambda-code/lambdas
scripts.push-to-s3-codebuild: aws s3 sync --acl private build/ s3://mundo-group-lambda-code/lambdas
scripts.deploy: npm run zipper && npm run push-to-s3
scripts.update-lambda: aws --region us-east-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name send-email --s3-bucket mundo-group-lambda-code --s3-key lambdas/sendEmail.zip --publish
scripts.update-lambda-local: aws --region us-east-1 lambda update-function-code --profile TMG_michael --function-name send-email --s3-bucket mundo-group-lambda-code --s3-key lambdas/sendEmail.zip --publish
scripts.local-deploy: npm run deploy && npm run update-lambda-local
